title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for correctly setting v(t) > 0

t cos t > 0, (or v(t) > 0)

1 point is earned for the first correct interval

1 point is earned for the second correct interval

Particle is moving up for 0<t< π 2  and for  3π 2 <t≤5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4B64@ .

0/3 if uses any function other than v(t)

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for correctly indicating a(t) = v′(t)

1 point is earned for the correct derivative

a(t) = v′(t) = cos t − t sin t
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for correctly indicating a(t) = v′(t)

1 point is earned for the correct derivative

a(t) = v′(t) = cos t − t sin t

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for correctly indicating a(t) = v′(t)

1 point is earned for the correct derivative

a(t) = v′(t) = cos t − t sin t

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for correctly indicating a(t) = v′(t)

1 point is earned for the correct derivative

a(t) = v′(t) = cos t − t sin t

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for correctly indicating y(t)= ∫ v(t) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamyEaiaacI cacaWG0bGaaiykaiabg2da9maapedabaGaamODaiaacIcacaWG0bGa aiykaaWcbaaabaaaniabgUIiYdaaaa@3FC2@

y(t)= ∫ v(t)dt u=t        dv=cost dt du=dt    v=sint

1 point is earned for the correct antiderivation (with or without C)

1 point is earned for the correct answer C = 2

y(t)= ∫ t cost dt=tsint− ∫ sint dt        =tsint+cost+C      3=1+C; C=2 y(t)=tsint+cost+2

To be eligible for the third point, antiderivative must have at least 2 terms and at least 1 trig term

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct answer

Any non-constant function from part (c) is eligible for point.

y( π 2 )= π 2 +2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4595@
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct answer

Any non-constant function from part (c) is eligible for point.

y( π 2 )= π 2 +2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4595@
